title: I Reincarnated as the Duke’s Only Blind Daughter - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Blind Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Disabilities   Engagement   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Magic   Magical Technology   Maids   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Namiko Makoto   波湖真
description:
I was born weak and passed away at the age of 18 due to illness. Before I die, I made a wish to be born again.

It came true but was born blind. Little by little I came to know the gaps between the previous world and present one thanks to my fiancé. This is the story of the Duke’s only daughter.>
